#id=1
#text=My hair had gotten really long , so I needed to get a haircut .
#id=2
#text=I went downtown to the barber shop and checked in .
#id=3
#text=There a few people ahead of me , so I had to wait a little while .
#id=4
#text=But that gave me some time to look in the books to pick out a good style for my hair .
#id=5
#text=When it was my turn , I showed the barber how I wanted my hair cut .
#id=6
#text=I got up in the barber chair , and the barber put a paper towel around my neck so the hair would n't get down on my shirt .
#id=7
#text=He put an apron on over me , and started cutting my hair .
#id=8
#text=I watched in the mirror as bits of hair would fall down as he cut .
#id=9
#text=I started to see the design I had chosen take shape .
#text=Before I knew it , he was brushing some loose hair off with his brush and I was all done .
#text=He did a great job , and my hair is just how I want it .
